attributes.action: After massive population growth, it's time to stop all immigration into the UK.
attributes.additional_details: We believe that the UK is seriously overpopulated having experienced massive immigration in recent years. School places are scarce, the health service is under pressure, roads and railways are congested and we are building houses on greenbelt land.
attributes.background: Withdraw from ECHR and other multi-national conventions to permit the UK to stop all further immigration from all sources, then pass legislation forbidding all further immigration without exception.
